events.message: I reported a car collision that happened yesterday at the intersection. My vehicle was severely damaged and I need to file a claim.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and damage description.
An agent has been assigned to your case and will be reaching out shortly to discuss next steps regarding your vehicle claim.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim and appreciate your prompt notification regarding the auto accident.
Please provide the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and your driver's license to proceed with the claim investigation.
All requested documents, including the police report and detailed images of the car damage, have been submitted for review.
The investigation into the circumstances and extent of the auto accident has officially begun.
The claim investigation has been completed, confirming the details and verifying the coverage for the vehicle damages.
We have proposed a settlement amount to cover the repairs of your vehicle and any applicable costs from the collision.
Thank you for your feedback regarding the proposed settlement; you have accepted the terms and the process will move forward.
Your claim has been approved based on the investigation results and submitted documents confirming fault and coverage.
The approved settlement payment has been processed and issued to your account to cover the vehicle repair costs.
Your auto accident claim is now officially closed following payment issuance; thank you for your cooperation.
